name: GoLocalGlobal.com
description: GoLocalGlobal.com helps you figure out t
overview:
Short version: GoLocalGlobal helps you figure out the best way to spend your free time based on your own personal interests in 250 cities in 50 countries around the world.

Long version: GoLocalGlobal is a “personalized by you, based on your interests” resource created with information provided by locals globally. The idea is simple: we want to help you spend your free time in the best way possible, no matter how diverse your interests are. Our mission is this: provide comprehensive, accurate “real time” information about 250 cities in 50 countries around the world. Whether it’s restaurants and cafes, bars and pubs, nightlife and night clubs, music and comedy, sporting events, the arts, shopping, sightseeing, adventure or if it’s just relaxation you’re after, we’ll get you the best information out there. In addition, after our Beta Test we will present you with opportunities to generate $$$ for yourself and help fight breast cancer with 20% of commissions generated on GoLocalGlobal going directly to Susan G. Komen for the Cure (the top breast cancer fighting charity rated by Charity Navigator). Pretty cool, huh?
